病: (doença/doente/doença) - sick , illness, disease; bad habit, weakness, fault
病と称する: (やまいとしょうする) - to feign illness; to pretend to be ill
病に冒される: (やまいにおかされる) - to be attacked by a disease
病は気から: (やまいはきから) - sickness and health start with the mind
病みつき: (やみつき) - being addicted to/being wholly absorbed by; falling ill/becoming sick
病みつく: (やみつく) - to be taken ill; to be addicted to; to become absorbed in; to give oneself up (to)
病み付き: (やみつき) - being addicted to/being wholly absorbed by; falling ill/becoming sick
病み付く: (やみつく) - to be taken ill; to be addicted to; to become absorbed in; to give oneself up (to)
病み耄ける: (やみほうける) - to become wasted by illness
病む: (やむ) - to fall ill; to be ill
病める: (やめる) - (病める only) sick/ill/ailing; to hurt/to ache
病を癒す: (やまいをいやす) - to cure an illness; to cure a disease
病んで後初めて健康の価値を知る: (やんでのちはじめてけんこうのかちをしる) - You don't appreciate the value of good health until you lose it
病中吟: (びょうちゅうぎん) - poems composed in one's sickbed
病人: (びょうにん) - sick person; patient; invalid
病人食: (びょうにんしょく) - invalid diet; diet for the sick; diet for patients
病体: (びょうたい) - sick body; poor health
病勢: (びょうせい) - a patient's condition; the state of an illness
病原: (びょうげん) - origin of an illness; cause of a disease; pathogenesis; etiology
病原微生物: (びょうげんびせいぶつ) - pathogenic microbe
病原性大腸菌: (びょうげんせいだいちょうきん) - pathogenic E. coli bacteria (i.e. Escherichia coli O157:H7)
病原菌: (びょうげんきん) - virus; germ; pathogen
病友: (びょうゆう) - sick friend; fellow patient
病名: (びょうめい) - name of a disease
病因: (びょういん) - the cause of a disease
病害: (びょうがい) - (crop) damage owing to disease or blight
病害虫: (びょうがいちゅう) - (insect) pest; insect carrying disease germs; insect causing damage to crops
病床日誌: (びょうしょうにっし) - day-by-day record of a patient's condition; diary written while ill in bed
病弊: (びょうへい) - evil influence; ill effect
病態生理学: (びょうたいせいりがく) - pathophysiology
病根: (びょうこん) - cause of a disease; root of an evil
病欠: (びょうけつ) - absence on account of illness
病死: (びょうし) - death from disease; death from illness
病歿: (びょうぼつ) - dying of illness; dying of natural causes
病気: (byouki) - illness (usu. excluindo doenças menores, por exemplo, resfriados), disease, sickness; weirdness, bad habit, bad behaviour, craziness, perversion
病気がち: (びょうきがち) - proneness to being ill; proneness to disease
病気にかかる: (びょうきにかかる) - to contract a disease
病気になる: (びょうきになる) - to fall ill; to be taken ill
病気に為る: (びょうきになる) - to fall ill; to be taken ill
病気に罹る: (びょうきにかかる) - to contract a disease
病気に託けて: (びょうきにかこつけて) - under the pretext of ill health
病気のふり: (びょうきのふり) - (usu. 病気のふりをする)  feigning illness; pretending to be ill
病気の振り: (びょうきのふり) - (usu. 病気のふりをする)  feigning illness; pretending to be ill
病気の流行: (びょうきのりゅうこう) - epidemic
病気休職: (びょうききゅうしょく) - sick leave; sickness leave
病気勝ち: (びょうきがち) - proneness to being ill; proneness to disease
病気見舞: (びょうきみまい) - (yoji) get-well card (gift, letter); visit to (inquiry after) a sick person
病気見舞い: (びょうきみまい) - (yoji) get-well card (gift, letter); visit to (inquiry after) a sick person
病没: (びょうぼつ) - dying of illness; dying of natural causes
病源: (びょうげん) - origin of an illness; cause of a disease; pathogenesis; etiology
病源菌: (びょうげんきん) - virus; germ; pathogen
病犬: (やまいぬ) - bad dog; rabid dog
病状: (びょうじょう) - patient's condition; pathology
病理解剖学: (びょうりかいぼうがく) - morbid anatomy
病症: (びょうしょう) - nature of a disease
病癖: (びょうへき) - bad habit; peculiarity; weakness
病者: (びょうじゃ) - sick person; patient; invalid
病者の塗油: (びょうしゃのとゆ) - Anointing of the Sick
病膏肓に入る: (やまいこうもうにいる) - to become seriously ill/to catch an incurable illness; to become a slave of a habit
病葉: (わくらば) - blighted leaves; diseased leaves
病虫害: (びょうちゅうがい) - (crop) damage from disease and harmful insects
病識: (びょうしき) - consciousness or awareness of being ill
病身: (びょうしん) - weak constitution; ill health
病躯: (びょうく) - sick body; sickly constitution
病閹: (びょうえん) - long illness that will not heal
病院を訪れる: (びょういんをおとずれる) - to visit (someone) in hospital
